reporter_caption.center: STATE THROUGH DEPARTMENT OF HIGHWAYS v. TERRAL, 251 La. 939 (1968)

caption.center: STATE OF LOUISIANA, THROUGH THE DEPARTMENT OF HIGHWAYS v. WILBURN W. TERRAL.

opinion.posture: IN RE: WILBURN W. TERRAL APPLYING FOR CERTIORARI, OR WRIT OF REVIEW, TO THE COURT OF APPEAL, THIRD CIRCUIT, PARISH OF RAPIDES.
opinion.opinion_text: [1] Writ refused. We find no error of law in the judgment of the Court of Appeal.
